makkahHotel: Hilton Convention Hotel or equivalent — facing Haram, breakfast included.
madinahHotel: Al Aqeeq Madinah Hotel or equivalent — facing Haram, breakfast included.
transportation: Private luxury transfers (Jeddah → Makkah → Madinah → Airport).
sightseeing: Guided tours of historical and spiritual landmarks.
visa: Saudi Tourist E-Visa included. A one-year, multiple-entry visa, allowing tourists to spend up to 90 days in the country. The tourist visa permits participation in tourism-related activities such as events, family and relatives visits, leisure, and Umrah (excluding Hajj) and excludes other activities such as studying.
whatToExpect: Dedicated 24-hour support team in both holy cities.
Live or virtual Umrah orientation sessions.

makkahHotel: Hilton Convention Hotel or similar — front of Haram, breakfast included.
madinahHotel: Al Aqeeq Madinah Hotel or similar — front of Haram, breakfast included.
transportation: Complete private luxury transportation covering all transfers from Jeddah Airport to Makkah Hotel, Makkah Hotel to Madinah Hotel, and Madinah Hotel to Madinah Airport.
sightseeing: Comprehensive guided tours exploring significant historical and spiritual landmarks throughout Makkah and Madinah.
visa: Saudi Tourist E-Visa included. A one-year, multiple-entry visa, allowing tourists to spend up to 90 days in the country. The tourist visa permits participation in tourism-related activities such as events, family and relatives visits, leisure, and Umrah (excluding Hajj) and excludes other activities such as studying.
whatToExpect: Professional meet and greet service upon arrival.
24-hour dedicated support service throughout your stay in Makkah and Madinah.
Online in-person preparatory session for Umrah guidance.

makkahHotel: Voco Hotel or equivalent — near Haram, with breakfast.
madinahHotel: Dar Al Naeem Hotel or equivalent — near Haram, with breakfast.
transportation: Private, luxury ground transfers from arrival to departure.
sightseeing: Guided exploration of sacred and historical landmarks.
visa: Saudi Tourist E-Visa included. One-year multiple-entry visa for up to 90 days per visit. Permits Umrah and religious tourism activities (excluding Hajj).
whatToExpect: Personalized reception and assistance upon arrival.
Free Umrah reading material and virtual preparation session.
